1.content: Who do you want to fatten up?
1.title: Which 'Blader?

choices: Someone starts feeding him more food
13.content: How will Kai gain weight?
13.title: Kai

choices: He starts to notice his reasoned weight gain.
He doesn't notice his weight gain.
131.content:
He has started to eat a lot more and it's really showing, he has gained quite a lot of weight.

His clothes has become a lot tighter, and it's getting harder to put them on.
131.title: He starts to eat more

choices: His friends  notice a change in his ones lean figure.
His friend invite him to dinner with them.
133.content: He has been hanging around his room a lot more and being lazy in stead of going outside and focusing on exercising.
133.title: He starts exercising les

choices: max walks out without eating his late breakfast
14.content:
max- oh suger, duh duh duh do oh honey honey, you are my cany girl and you got me wanting you

kai- max please stop singing we have enough of that when tyson is trying to sing in the shower we don't need it from you

tyson- hey i'm not that bad kai just cause you can't sing you wet blanket

kai- hn what ever you say tyson

kai looked at the clock which read 11.00am, kai looked over at rei who was making a late breakfast seeing as it took longer to try and get tyson out of bed, kai looked past rei, kenny and tyson to max who recently started to get a bit chubby kai thought to himself that he should speak to him about it later.

rei- okay here's everyone's late breakfast

rei handed out their meals kai had cheese on toast, kenny had a sandwich, tyson had a bolw of cereal with 2 slices of toast and max had a bowl of suger coated, suger bits, rei sighed as he looked at max's choice of food

rei- max have you ever thought of not eating lots of suger

max stared at rei in disbelif
14.title: Max suger, suger ruin

1511.content: Who will force feed Ray?
1511.title: force feeding

info.brief_description: Blading is going to be the least of the Blade Breakers' concerns when they start to gain!
info.description:
Blading and gaining, Blading and gaining... Our favorite Beyblading team, the Blade Breakers, must deal with both! Hoo boy, this'll be something...

Guidelines:

No killing anybody off/making them immobile

No gay/yaoi relations

Have fun!
